c74object.name: somax.audioinfluencer
c74object.digest: Analyzes and segments audio into discrete labels in real-time
c74object.description: The audio influencer segments and analyzes an incoming signal with respect to pitch, chroma and onset into discrete labels, which then can be used to influence a somax.player in order to control the player's way of navigating through the corpus.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Trigger segmentation, when onset method is set to `external'
method.description: When onsetmethod is set to external, the segmentation is triggered each time a bang is received on the inlet of the somax.audioinfluencer.

method.name: int
method.description:
Any number other than 0 enables the somax.audioinfluencer.
0 disables somax.audioinfluencer.

method.name: dump
method.digest: Dump all current parameter values on the second outlet
method.description: The dump message will cause the somax.audioinfluencer to output the current values of all its parameters out its second outlet.

method.name: signal
method.description: Send an audio signal to the somax.audioinfluencer for analysys. The audio signal can be mono, stereo or a multi-channel signal.

method.name: openwindow
method.digest: Open the audio influencer parameters window
method.description: Open the somax.audioinfluencer window, with access to a user interface to control all the parameters of the analysis. The window provides also visual feedback for the analyzed signal with respect to chroma, onset and pitch.

attribute.name: bonkdebounce
attribute.digest: Set bonk debounce decay rate value

attribute.name: chromadecay
attribute.digest: Set decay rate value for the chroma filter

attribute.name: onsetlimit
attribute.digest: Set minimum amount of time (ms) between two consecutive onsets

attribute.name: onsetmethod
attribute.description:
The onsetmethod message determines which algorithm should be used by the somax.audioinfluencer for onset detection. There are three methods, selected with the following messages.
The message onsetmethod 0 or onsetmethod external sets onset detection from the external inlet, the message onsetmethod 1 or onsetmethod bonk sets the onset detection from Bonk algorithm, the message onsetmethod 2 or onsetmethod yin sets the onset detection from Yin algorithm (default method).

attribute.name: yinquality
attribute.digest: Set value for yin quality threshold
